hour_insured.description: Triv uses cutting-edge technology and ensures that you can trade with low latency. Unlike traditional stock markets, Triv's stock market is open 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.

questions.title: What is tokenized stock?
questions.description: Stock tokens are shares that are tokenized on the blockchain, the price of 1 token follows the price of 1 share, according to its underlying asset. Unlike the traditional stock market which has holidays. Stock tokens can be traded 24/7 without holidays.

questions.title: Will i get dividend?
questions.description: Yes, just like traditional stocks, stock token holders will also get dividends. Unlike traditional stock markets, dividends from stock tokens can be withdrawn 24/7 without holidays to all banks and digital wallets Instantly.

questions.title: Who can trade?
questions.description: All Indonesian residents aged 17 years and over and have an ID card for verification.

questions.title: Are there any additional costs?
questions.description: Triv does not charge monthly fees or subscription fees, the only fees charged to users are trading fees. So you are free to choose to invest in the long term or speculate in the short term.

questions.title: Are there any limitations?
questions.description: There are no limitations in your trading decisions, Triv has more than 80 indicators that you can use in making your trading decisions.
